name: Dreams (itch) (Antelopes Go Productions)
description: Dreams is an action-platformer that relies on quick reflexes and solid platforming. The game spans 5 locations, or dreamscapes, including Caves and Towers. Other more dreamlike locations include Ocean and Abstract. Dreams is the story of Nate, a young boy with an active imagination. Every night when he goes to sleep he dreams of adventure and unknown wonder. This game follows one particular night.
